about_the_game:
Ancraophobia

Horror game based around, identifying and catching ghosts.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Pickup/Interact: LMB

Change Slot: 1-4

Cycle Slot: Tab

Drop: G

Pause Menu: ESC

Sprint: SHIFT or R

Interact with held item: E

Journal: J

Move Door: Hold LMB + Scroll

Push To Talk/Mute: C

How To Play

  • Start the game, interact with the whiteboard to enter the main menu.

  • Press start game in the main menu to enter the game.

  • Use the tools provided to find evidences (Press J to view all evidences).

  • When you find evidences tick them off in the journal (J).

  • Once you find all 3 evidences take the ghost trap, interact with it (E) and select the only remaining ghost from the journal (J).Then place the trap somewhere the ghost will likely go (The doorway to it's room will work well).

  • Once you hear a success sound and see the trap close you can take the trap out of the house. You win!

  • If the trap makes a breaking sound and disappears you have lost, the ghost will hunt you until you are dead.

Things To Note

The ghost will only give 3 evidences.

Each ghost has a favourite room, the ghost will spend most of it's time in it's favourite room. You can find the favourite room by checking the temperatures of all the rooms.

The room which is consistently cooler than the others is likely to be the ghost's favourite room but not certain.

The ghost can turn the light of its current room on/off from anywhere but it has to be near a door or object to interact with it.

How To Get Evidences

Spirit Box

Turn it on and wait to see if the ghost says something.

The spirit box will only give a response if: you are within a certain distance of the ghost, the spirit box is in a room with the light off, and is not outside.

Ghost Writing

Ghost writing will occur if the ghost attempts to throw the clipboard, it will instead write on the clipboard.

If the clipboard is thrown and there is no writing on it it means the ghost does not have ghost writing as an evidence.

Crucifix

If the ghost attempts to hunt and is in the range of the crucifix then the crucific will burn (glow red and make a noise) and there will be no hunt.

If the ghost does not have crucifix as an evidence then it will do nothing.

Ghost Camera

Using the camera you may be able to see the ghost while it is not visible normally. If you see the ghost and it is not hunting then you have got the evidence.

You won't always be able to see the ghost just because it has the evidence, it will only show every 10-50 seconds and only for a short time.

EMF 5

If you get level 5 (The red dot, meaning all the lights are lit up and the tone is very high) then you got the evidence.

Blood

When the ghost throws something it has a chance (it isn't 100%) to make a blood splat on the first surface it touches. If you see a blood splat then you have the evidence.
